Articles.Content:
So per the Daily kerbal post here, it looks like 0.24 is going to testing so we can start the countdown until release!who else is excited?

Edited March 5, 2014 by DoctorCruz

"...moving things around", a small delay?

Excited Yes!
QA shouldn't take more than a month right?

Guys, what that says is that some of the devs spent some of their week testing some aspects of the game sub-divisions they are responsible for. That is not the same thing as a version going to testing. In other words, don't hold your breath, and I'm going to close this thread to avoid confusion.
